text: can't you just create and maintain this customobject in your app's environment?
or are you trying to keep customer data from persisting in your env

hey everyone, hope it's a good day! I was wondering if there was a latest and greatest approach to working with Custom Workflow Actions and versioning, where the app developer may want/need to update existing actions and not break existing versions clients may have configured in their workflows

I presume their actions would remain intact and best practice would be to remain backwards compatible from our side (our app) and then just let them know a new version is out? Or is there a native HS feature that prompts users to update to the latest app and review their workflows or something?

The most relevant thread I found was from January: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C2YGWHDKQ/p1704906599409549>
Does anyone use <http://Productive.io|Productive.io> and have it integrated with HubSpot? I'd love to hear what you think about it, thanks!
